select b.bno, b.photo, b.title, b.views, b.id, b.cre_dt, group_concat(l.int_code) as int_code from board b inner join cour_loc cl on b.bno = cl.bno inner join location l on cl.lno = l.lno where (b.bno = cl.bno and b.isboard=1 and id!='admin') group by b.bno order by
b.title b.views b.cre_dt
asc desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}

select b.bno, b.photo, b.title, b.views, b.id, b.cre_dt, group_concat(l.int_code) as int_code from board b inner join cour_loc cl on b.bno = cl.bno inner join location l on cl.lno = l.lno inner join mem_int m on m.int_code = l.int_code where isboard=1 and m.id=#{id} group by b.bno order by
b.title b.views b.bno
asc desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
